sentence: The ad is more than a little reminiscent of Rick Snyder's "one tough nerd" Super Bowl commercial from his successful 2010 bid (probably not coincidentally, consultant John Yob worked on both campaigns): The narrator declares, "When your car door closes just right, thank Perry Johnson.
title: Morning Digest: Billionaire developer rounds out the field in crowded race for mayor of Los Angeles

sentence: Governors ? MI-Gov: Wealthy businessman Perry Johnson's new spot for the August GOP primary blames Democratic incumbent Gretchen Whitmer, Joe Biden, and the state's former governor, Secretary of Energy Jennifer Granholm, for high gas prices.
title: Morning Digest: Trump's 'bro' now frontrunner following Ohio Republican's unexpected retirement
